title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.14 - Medicare select policies and certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.14 - Medicare select policies and certificates

State Regulations

Medicare select policy or Medicare select certificate means a Medicare supplement policy or certificate respectively, that contains restricted network provisions. Medicare select policies and certificates are governed by the rules set forth in Part 58 (Regulation 193) of this Title. The disclosure requirements for Medicare select insurance are set forth in sections 58.3 and
58.5
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11

52.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
